text: James or Jim Griffiths may refer to: *James Griffiths (Australian politician) (1872–1916), Australian politician *James Griffiths (director), British television and film director *James Griffiths (rugby union) (born 1977), Welsh rugby player *Jim Griffiths (1890–1975), Welsh politician *Jim Griffiths (cricketer) (born 1949), English cricketer *James Griffiths (minister) (1856–1933), Welsh Baptist minister ==See also== *James Griffith (disambiguation)
title: James Griffiths
